rows.business_item_short_description: The Windows operating system is designed to deliver a more personal computing experience for users.
rows.business_item_long_description: The Windows operating system is designed to deliver a more personal computing experience for users by enabling consistency of experience, applications, and information across their devices. Windows OEM revenue is impacted significantly by the number of Windows operating system licenses purchased by OEMs, which they pre-install on the devices they sell.
rows.evidence_span: The Windows operating system is designed to deliver a more personal computing experience for users by enabling consistency of experience, applications, and information across their devices. Windows OEM revenue is impacted significantly by the number of Windows operating system licenses purchased by OEMs, which they pre-install on the devices they sell.

rows.business_item_short_description: Surface is designed to help organizations, students, and consumers be more productive.
rows.business_item_long_description: We design and sell devices, such as Surface (including Copilot+ PCs) and PC accessories. Surface is designed to help organizations, students, and consumers be more productive.
rows.evidence_span: We design and sell devices, such as Surface (including Copilot+ PCs) and PC accessories. Our devices are designed to enable people and organizations to connect to the people and content that matter most using Windows and integrated Microsoft products and services. Surface is designed to help organizations, students, and consumers be more productive.

rows.business_item_short_description: Xbox enables people to connect and share online gaming experiences that are accessible on Xbox consoles, Windows-enabled devices, and other devices.
rows.business_item_long_description: Xbox enables people to connect and share online gaming experiences that are accessible on Xbox consoles, Windows-enabled devices, and other devices. Xbox is designed to benefit users by providing access to a network of certified applications and services and to benefit our developer and partner ecosystems by providing access to a large customer base.
rows.evidence_span: Xbox enables people to connect and share online gaming experiences that are accessible on Xbox consoles, Windows-enabled devices, and other devices. Xbox is designed to benefit users by providing access to a network of certified applications and services and to benefit our developer and partner ecosystems by providing access to a large customer base.

rows.business_item_short_description: Xbox Game Pass is a subscription service and gaming community with access to a curated library of first- and third-party titles.
rows.business_item_long_description: These unique gaming experiences are the cornerstone of Xbox Game Pass, a subscription service and gaming community with access to a curated library of first- and third-party titles. The gamer remains at the heart of the Xbox ecosystem.
rows.evidence_span: These unique gaming experiences are the cornerstone of Xbox Game Pass, a subscription service and gaming community with access to a curated library of first- and third-party titles. The gamer remains at the heart of the Xbox ecosystem.

rows.business_item_short_description: Our gaming platform competes with other console platforms. We believe our gaming platform is effectively po
rows.business_item_long_description: Xbox and our cloud gaming services face competition from various online gaming ecosystems and game streaming services. We also compete with other providers of entertainment services such as video streaming platforms.
rows.evidence_span: Xbox and our cloud gaming services face competition from various online gaming ecosystems and game streaming services. We also compete with other providers of entertainment services such as video streaming platforms.

rows.business_item_short_description: Our Microsoft Edge browser and Bing search engine with Copilot are key tools to enable user acquisition and engagement.
rows.business_item_long_description: Our Microsoft Edge browser and Bing search engine with Copilot are key tools to enable user acquisition and engagement, while our technology platform enables accelerated delivery of digital advertising solutions.
rows.evidence_span: Our Microsoft Edge browser and Bing search engine with Copilot are key tools to enable user acquisition and engagement, while our technology platform enables accelerated delivery of digital advertising solutions.

rows.business_item_short_description: Microsoft Copilot is a digital companion designed to inform, entertain, and inspire.
rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft Copilot is a digital companion designed to inform, entertain, and inspire. Our Microsoft Edge browser and Bing search engine with Copilot are key tools to enable user acquisition and engagement.
rows.evidence_span: Microsoft Copilot is a digital companion designed to inform, entertain, and inspire. Our Microsoft Edge browser and Bing search engine with Copilot are key tools to enable user acquisition and engagement, while our technology platform enables accelerated delivery of digital advertising solutions.

rows.business_item_short_description: Search and news advertising, comprising Bing and Copilot, Microsoft News, Microsoft Edge, and third-party affiliates.
rows.business_item_long_description: Search and news advertising, comprising Bing and Copilot, Microsoft News, Microsoft Edge, and third-party affiliates. Our Search and news advertising business is designed to deliver relevant search, native, and display advertising to a global audience.
rows.evidence_span: Search and news advertising, comprising Bing and Copilot, Microsoft News, Microsoft Edge, and third-party affiliates. Our Search and news advertising business is designed to deliver relevant search, native, and display advertising to a global audience.

rows.business_item_short_description: Our Microsoft Edge browser and Bing search engine with Copilot are key tools to enable user acquisition and engagement.

rows.business_item: Microsoft 365 Commercial products and cloud services
rows.business_item_short_description: Microsoft 365 Commercial products and cloud services include Microsoft 365 Commercial cloud, comprising Microsoft 365 Commercial, Enterprise Mobility + Security, and other related services.
rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft 365 Commercial products and cloud services primarily comprise Microsoft 365 Commercial cloud, which includes Microsoft 365 Commercial, Enterprise Mobility + Security, the cloud portion of Windows Commercial, the per-user portion of Power BI, Exchange, SharePoint, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft 365 Security and Compliance, and Microsoft 365 Copilot. They also include Microsoft 365 Commercial products, comprising Windows Commercial on-premises and Office licensed on-premises.
rows.evidence_span: This segment primarily comprises: • Microsoft 365 Commercial products and cloud services, including Microsoft 365 Commercial cloud, comprising Microsoft 365 Commercial, Enterprise Mobility + Security, the cloud portion of Windows Commercial, the per-user portion of Power BI, Exchange, SharePoint, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft 365 Security and Compliance, and Microsoft 365 Copilot; and Microsoft 365 Commercial products, comprising Windows Commercial on-premises and Office licensed on-premises.

rows.business_item: Microsoft 365 Consumer products and cloud services
rows.business_item_short_description: Microsoft 365 Consumer products and cloud services include Microsoft 365 Consumer subscriptions, Office licensed on-premises, and other consumer services.
rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft 365 Consumer products and cloud services include Microsoft 365 Consumer subscriptions, Office licensed on-premises, and other consumer services. Growth depends on reaching new users, adding value with new features including AI tools, and expanding product and service offerings into new markets.
rows.evidence_span: • Microsoft 365 Consumer products and cloud services, including Microsoft 365 Consumer subscriptions, Office licensed on-premises, and other consumer services.

rows.business_item_short_description: LinkedIn connects the world’s professionals to make them more productive and successful and transforms the way companies hire, market, sell, and learn.
rows.business_item_long_description: LinkedIn connects the world’s professionals to make them more productive and successful and transforms the way companies hire, market, sell, and learn. In addition to LinkedIn’s free services, LinkedIn offers monetized solutions designed to offer AI-enabled insights and productivity: Talent Solutions, Marketing Solutions, Premium Subscriptions, and Sales Solutions.
rows.evidence_span: • LinkedIn, including Talent Solutions, Marketing Solutions, Premium Subscriptions, and Sales Solutions. LinkedIn connects the world’s professionals to make them more productive and successful and transforms the way companies hire, market, sell, and learn.

rows.business_item_short_description: Dynamics provides cloud-based and on-premises business solutions for financial management, ERP, CRM, and supply chain management.
rows.business_item_long_description: Dynamics provides cloud-based and on-premises business solutions for financial management, enterprise resource planning (“ERP”), customer relationship management (“CRM”), and supply chain management, as well as agentic AI and other low code application development platforms, for small and medium businesses, large organizations, and divisions of global enterprises. Dynamics revenue is driven by the number of users licensed and applications consumed, expansion of average revenue per user, and the continued shift to Dynamics 365.
rows.evidence_span: • Dynamics products and cloud services, including Dynamics 365, comprising a set of intelligent, cloud-based applications across ERP, CRM, Power Apps, and Power Automate; and on-premises ERP and CRM applications. Dynamics provides cloud-based and on-premises business solutions for financial management, enterprise resource planning (“ERP”), customer relationship management (“CRM”), and supply chain management, as well as agentic AI and other low code application development platforms, for small and medium businesses, large organizations, and divisions of global enterprises.
